snippet.title: birdsfoot trefoil
snippet.description: trefoil Lotus corniculatus, a flowering plant native to grassland in Eurasia and North Africa.

snippet.title: thornveld
snippet.description: type of grassland (veldt or veld) in southern Africa characterised by acacia and other thorny plants.
